description: This file defines a React functional component 'AccommodationsPage' used for displaying and selecting camp accommodations. It includes internal state management for listing different accommodation types, allows toggling assignment status, and renders UI elements for user interaction.

methods.name: AccommodationsPage()
methods.description: React functional component that displays accommodation options and manages their assignment state.

methods.name: handleAssign
methods.description: Handles assigning or unassigning a specific accommodation based on user interaction.
